meanings.sent1: The museum displayed an iconographical painting of a famous historical event.
meanings.sent2: The artist's iconographical style was evident in all his works.
meanings.sent3: The iconographical interpretation of the painting made the viewers chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her iconographical approach to storytelling painted vivid pictures in the minds of the audience.
meanings.sent5: The iconographical details in the artwork brought the scene to life.

meanings.definition: Describing or representing images or symbols.
meanings.sent1: The book cover had an iconographical design that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The iconographical elements in the logo conveyed a sense of tradition.
meanings.sent3: The iconographical representation of the character added a touch of humor to the story.
meanings.sent4: His words were an iconographical map guiding us through the complex ideas.
meanings.sent5: The iconographical symbols on the ancient artifact puzzled the archaeologists.
